fields.name: Divide:
fields.value: Target a player. If they’re an investigative role, one of their abilities will have a 50% chance to give false information the next time they use it. If they aren’t investigative, they’re considered “prepped” for Derail.

fields.name: Derail:
fields.value: Target someone who is prepped via Divide. Any investigative abilities used on them will have a 50% chance to give false information for the rest of the game.

fields.name: Delete (Locked, x1):
fields.value: This ability cannot be restocked by any means. Unlock by placing in the top 3. Target a player. Any investigative abilities used on them will yield no feedback for the rest of the game.
